story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_0100_:
I managed to sneak into their hideout, but where
are the ones I’m after?
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_: Hey, let’s get started before anyone notices us.
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_0400_:
They’re looking around a lot, considering they’re in
their own hideout.
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_0500_:
Come on! Let’s get the data analysis going before
the others find out!
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_0600_:
There’s definitely something off about them. Are
they the traitors she was talking about?
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_0800_:
Are they suspicious, Porygon? Also, this area
should have been cleared of people.
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_1000_:
Heh, I didn’t expect my cover to be blown so
soon, but that’s fine.
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_1100_:
This is the International Police! Stay calm and
follow our orders!
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_1400_: Emma! Paulo! I’ll guide them to you as planned!
story_teamflare_02_01000/2401_1001_1600_: I’m gonna help you out, Mr. Looker!
